video.title: Big and Small
video.synopsis: Big and Small, who are best friends despite being very different, always have fun adventures as they explore the world around them and solve problems.

episodes.synopsis: Big receives his very first guest, the exuberant and aptly named Small; Big tries to make Small feel welcome by building him his own tiny door.
episodes.title: Something Is Missing / A Door for Small

episodes.synopsis: Big and Small disagree about whether to catch a fish and keep it as a pet; Small is irritated when Big invents a machine to clean up his messes.
episodes.title: Fish Wish / There's a Space for Small

episodes.synopsis: Big is upset when he has trouble with his new invention, a Sunshine Catcher; Big and Small befriend a worm they find in an apple and name her Twiba.
episodes.title: A Piece of Cake / The Worm in Big's Apple

episodes.synopsis: Small is frightened of Big's favorite toy and buries it in the garden; Big and Small discover that they're both afraid of thunderstorms.
episodes.title: The Case of the Missing 'Saur / Stormy Weather

episodes.synopsis: Big goes out for the day and leaves Small a long list of rules to follow; the boys interfere when Ruby tries to write a fun song by herself.
episodes.title: Playing by the Rules / A Sound Idea

episodes.synopsis: After ruining Big's watering hose, Small looks for a new way to water the flowers; Big accidentally puts Small's sock puppet into the wash.
episodes.title: Rain Dance / My Friend Fang

episodes.synopsis: Big and Small both learn to appreciate stargazing; while Big works on his latest invention, a Good Luck Machine, Small is plagued by bad luck.
episodes.title: Starry Starry Night / Bad Luck Machine

episodes.synopsis: Big is a terrible patient when he's got a cold, but Small is even worse as a nurse; the friends have an unsettling adventure in the Mysterious Woods.
episodes.title: The Big Sneeze / The Mysterious Woods

episodes.synopsis: Big and Small get in each other's way while planning dueling surprises; Small grows jealous of Big's devotion to T-Rex, his favorite stuffed toy.
episodes.title: Surprise, Surprise / The Sleep-Toy-Thingie

episodes.synopsis: Big learns to let go of his treasured tomatoes and enjoy himself; Big and Small pool their artistic talents to paint a portrait of Ruby.
episodes.title: Smashing Tomatoes / Picture Perfect

episodes.synopsis: Big and Small go on a treasure hunt with Twiba in the garden; Big and Ruby can't concentrate on their writing when Small stomps around in clogs.
episodes.title: Twiba's Treasure Hunt / The Case of the Clogs

episodes.synopsis: Small mistakenly thinks that Twiba will turn into a butterfly; a snowstorm keeps a frustrated Small inside when he'd much rather be outside.
episodes.title: Twiba Takes Flight / Cabin Fever

episodes.synopsis: The two pals are thrilled when it snows and they get to go sledding; a noise makes Small think that his favorite book character is in the garden.
episodes.title: Five Minute Sled (Christmas Episode) / The Gwelf in the Garden
